text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Elden Ring, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501 (8th-Gen) 15.6" Ultra Slim Gaming Laptop, 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel, GTX 1080 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 512 GB PCIe SSD, 16 GB DDR4 2666 MHz. The battery life is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1080 in the ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501 (8th-Gen) 15.6" Ultra Slim Gaming Laptop, 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel, GTX 1080 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 512 GB PCIe SSD, 16 GB DDR4 2666 MHz is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Avoid the ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501 (8th-Gen) 15.6" Ultra Slim Gaming Laptop, 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel, GTX 1080 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 512 GB PCIe SSD, 16 GB DDR4 2666 MHz if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1080 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1080 in the ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501 (8th-Gen) 15.6" Ultra Slim Gaming Laptop, 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel, GTX 1080 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 512 GB PCIe SSD, 16 GB DDR4 2666 MHz is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Zephyrus GX501 (8th-Gen) 15.6" Ultra Slim Gaming Laptop, 144 Hz IPS-Type G-SYNC Panel, GTX 1080 8 GB, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor (up to 3.9 GHz), 512 GB PCIe SSD, 16 GB DDR4 2666 MHz is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
